original_text: Yea, they shall not be planted; yea, they shall not be sown: yea, their stock shall not take root in the earth: and he shall also blow upon them, and they shall wither, and the whirlwind shall take them away as stubble.
korean_text: 그들은 겨우 심기고 겨우 뿌려졌으며 그 줄기가 겨우 땅에 뿌리를 박자 곧 하나님이 입김을 부시니 그들은 말라 회오리바람에 불려 가는 초개 같도다

sentences.original_text: Yea, they shall not be planted
yea, they shall not be sown
yea, their stock shall not take root in the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 그들의 줄기는 땅에 뿌리 내리지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall also blow upon them
and the whirlwind shall take them away as stubble
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 회오리바람이 그들을 짚단처럼 쓸어갈 것이다
